channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+3440] Caught Cheating.......
[+2571] Placebo Button?! We Are *Seriously* Being $#%!ed With [WTF?]
item.description: "A placebo button is a push-button that appears to do something, but actually has no effect, like a placebo. They exist to give the user an illusion of control.[1] Many walk buttons at pedestrian crossings in New York City were once functional, but now serve as placebo buttons.[2] Many door close buttons in elevators are placebo buttons.[1][3]"

item.title: [+1820] Shocking Statistics About Teen Pregnancy [PIC]
[+1576] ID This Partial Logo, Help Find A Hit And Run Suspect
item.description: Mark Grgurich, 54, of Des Moines was killed cycling in rural Iowa when a speeding truck slammed into him, then sped away from the scene. Police recovered this partial logo and are asking for help identifying it.

item.title: [+1571] Boondock Saints 2: All Saints Day Trailer (HD)
item.description: Nearly a decade later, writer and director Troy Duffy is back with Boondock Saints 2. The MacManus brothers have been in deep hiding in the quiet valleys of Ireland, far removed from their former lives. When Word comes that a priest has been killed by sinister forces in Boston, they return to mount a violent and bloody crusade of justice.

item.title: [+1448] Cat Limps Home With 13-Inch Arrow Shot Through Its Head
item.description: Brownie, a 4-year-old cat who has drifted away from his home, returned to the delight but then horror of his owners. Glad to have him back, they were in turn horrified that he had a 13-inch arrow stuck through his head.

item.title: [+1282] Alien baby or elaborate hoax?
item.description: Is this bizarre creature an alien baby or just part of an elaborate hoax - and was it the cause of the mysterious death of the man who claimed to have caught and drowned it?

item.title: [+1199] Porn In Your Life [Timeline]
[+1176] Wheelchair-Bound Woman Shouted Down At New Jersey Health Car
item.description: It's a new low for the anti-health reform "townshirts." Congressman Frank Pallone (D-NJ) had his hands full at a town hall meeting in Red Bank last week. More than 1,500 people showed up to talk health care, but things quickly turned ugly.

item.title: [+1068] How 20 Popular Websites Looked When They Launched
item.description: From Google to youtube, from craigslist to flickr - how some of today's biggest sites looked back in the early days of their existence.

item.title: [+1041] Condoms [Comic]
[+959] 7 Beloved Celebrities And The Awful Shit You Forgot They Did
item.description: If she didn't want Dr. Dre to beat the crap out of her, she should've read the N.W.A. constitution.

item.title: [+890] Valve to punish idlers and reward everyone else
item.description: Over the next few days we'll be removing all TF2 items that were earned using external idling applications. We're going to adopt a zero tolerance policy for external applications used to manipulate the persistent item system.

item.title: [+766] Cut Costs of Missions to Mars - Don't Bring Astronauts Back
item.description: There is a way to reduce the cost, risks and technical requirements of human travel to Mars, but it demands that we ask a vexing question: Why are we so interested in bringing the Mars astronauts home again?

item.title: [+676] This simplification of two remotes made me smile.....
[+660] Men lose their minds speaking to pretty women
item.description: The research shows men who spend even a few minutes in the company of an attractive woman perform less well in tests designed to measure brain function than those who chat to someone they do not find attractive.

item.title: [+580] Weeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee!
[+575] Boston Market now offers favors
item.description: This should help bring in extra business at Boston Market.I saw this sign at Boston Market and I had to take a picture. For those of you who do not get it, please click on the below link.www.urbandictionary.com/define.php?term=Toss%20Your%20Salad

item.title: [+537] A World Without Apple?
item.description: South Korea serves as a great example of what the world might look like if the iPod and iPhone had never happened.

item.title: [+527] Interview: Justin From Twitter's ShitMyDadSays
item.description: We talk to the guy behind the Internet's greatest Twitter page.
